thread.section_title: RC Planet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Planet | www.rcplanet.com | 4 of 118
thread.title: RCKarzJoey

author: RCKarzJoey
title: RCKarzJoey
text: I had been looking for this specific product that had been discontinued. I could only find it on eBay from some unknown sellers when I came across a google search result for it in RCPlanet. Being a bit skeptical with online shopping outside your standard Amazon or retail brick and mortar websites... I chose to give RCPlanet a call to confirm that they had the product as listed on their website. Sales confirmed it for me, so I went on created an account and placed my order it was received within a couple days even thought shipment had to be split from their 2 warehouses. I will continue to shop at RCPlanet and will recommend to family and friends.
